testcase.name: User verification for filter options in different catalogs
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the mystore page...........................................passed And user click on Signin link...............................................passed And user enter the emailandPWD..............................................passed When user click on signin button............................................passed Then MyStore home page displayed............................................passed And user navigate to cloths men page........................................passed When user select the size M.................................................passed Then user verified size M is enabled........................................passed And user is on the art page.................................................passed When user select dimensions sixtyninty......................................passed Then the user virified selected dimension is enabled........................passed And user is on clothes women page...........................................passed When user select sortby index 1.............................................passed Then Name A to Z selected in sortby dropdown................................passed And user enter mug in search bar............................................passed Then verifes the current url................................................passed Then user close the window..................................................passed
